title: Best of The Herd: 06/04/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 06/04/2019
description:
Colin thinks that LeBron James is ready to hit the eject button on his Lakers career and explains why.  He says that Odell Beckham Jr.'s priorities and the Browns priorities are not aligned.  He believes Las Vegas is disrespecting the Raptors.  Plus, LaVar Ball comes in studio to explain why Lonzo Ball won't be traded and how he knew Magic wasn't ever really in charge of the Lakers.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
